Token.Abstract: A DTWebArchive object represents a webpage that can be archived—for example, archived on disk or on the pasteboard. A DTWebArchive object contains the main resource, as well as the subresources and subframes of the main resource. The main resource can be an entire webpage, a portion of a webpage, or some other kind of data such as an image. Use this class to archive webpages, or place a portion of a webpage on the pasteboard, or to represent rich web content in any application.
Initializes the receiver with a resource and optional subresources and subframe archives.

Parameter.Name: mainResource
Parameter.Abstract: The main resource for the archive.

Parameter.Name: subresources
Parameter.Abstract: An array of DTWebResource objects or nil if none are specified.

Parameter.Name: subframeArchives
Parameter.Abstract: An array of DTWebArchive objects used by the sub frames or nil if none are specified.

Token.Abstract: Returns the receiver’s sub resources, or nil if there are none.
Returns archives representing the receiver’s sub frame archives or nil if there are none.
Returns the data representation of the receiver.
